Level 1 Conjuration Spell

The thorns deal Weapon Damage to the target and then explode. The explosion deals an additional 1~10 Piercing damage to the target and surrounding creatures.

On Miss: Thorns still explode.On Save: Targets still take half damage from the explosion.

Hail of Thorns is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Hail of Thorns is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Hail of Thorns Information

Description: The thorns deal Weapon Damage to the target and then explode. The explosion deals an additional 1~10 Piercing damage to the target and surrounding creatures. On Miss: Thorns still explode. On Save: Targets still take half damage from the explosion. Level: Lvl 1 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Bonus Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: DEX Save
